paper_abstract: For a family of three dimensional systems with center manifolds filled with closed trajectories (corresponding to periodic solutions of the system) we give criteria on the coefficients of the system to distinguish between the cases of isochronous and non-isochronous oscillations. Bifurcations of critical periods of the system are studied as well. The study is performed using computer algebra systems MATHEMATICA and SINGULAR.
paper_title: Investigation of center manifolds of three-dimensional systems using computer algebra
